Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students holding a string telephone to show how they communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate how the sound travels through the string by using arrows or another visual indicator.
The student can depict the required materials used to create the string telephone.
The student can label the drawing to explain the scientific concept of sound traveling through the string.
The student can include a note or drawing that highlights the importance of communication over long distances.
